item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VMLMIXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Pro Global

Codename: corot

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VMLMIXM | 15.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 4101874f9dda05c08dab588a4f62cb06

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.100.0.VMLTRXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T Pro Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Pro Turkey

Codename: corot

Version: OS2.0.100.0.VMLTRXM | 15.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 00487a71c0d5cd32d0a96a4338aeeefe

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Gallery]
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.17.0.UMLCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K60 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K60 Ultra China

Codename: corot

Version: OS1.0.17.0.UMLCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: df5b9ad2c6572a21f4ac9858385e9ea2

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Optimization: Improved system resource recovery strategy when switching apps to enhance app smoothness
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Fix: Having too many notifications could cause the system to restart

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.1.5.0.VMLEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T Pro EEA
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Pro EEA

Codename: corot

Version: OS1.1.5.0.VMLEUXM | 15.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 03d35d5f9509109d58a66caf27aa4e03

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
Optimization: Folder icons weren't always fully displayed
Optimization: An issue when a lot of space in the upper part of the screen was left blank in the Home screen layout
Optimization: App drawer layout
Fix: Home screen stopped working in some cases
[Recents]
Fix: App card started shaking when card order was rearranged
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Fix: Screenshots turned out black for some apps

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.1.4.0.VMLMIXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Pro Global

Codename: corot

Version: OS1.1.4.0.VMLMIXM | 15.0

Size: 6.0 GB

MD5: 3734f0c91ff1d9ca7c44656e92fa2f51

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Some devices rebooted unexpectedly
[Home screen]
Optimization: Folder icons weren't always fully displayed
Optimization: An issue when a lot of space in the upper part of the screen was left blank in the Home screen layout
Optimization: App drawer layout
Fix: Home screen stopped working in some cases
[Recents]
Fix: App card started shaking when card order was rearranged
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Fix: Screenshots turned out black for some apps

Download: Here
